title: My RP Disappeared and I don't know why.
body: I had recently bought Popstar Ahri as part of my "Teemoing Store" random skin that November 3rd. I had over 300 rp left, but now that I logged off and back in a few hours later, it's saying I'm only have in the 100's. Could I be told why? And how I can get my RP that I paid for back? It happened multiple times before.

replies.body: I took a look into this, but was unable to see anything out of the ordinary.  After Popstar Ahri, it looks like two championship chests were also purchased just a few minutes after.  You can also check your purchase history in the store, under the account section.  Hope that helps clear things up!
